listitem.para: Functions that access the ITM debug interface.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Functions that configure the System.

section.title: SysTick_Config()
section.para: The function initializes the System Timer and its interrupt, and starts the System Tick Timer. Counter is in free running mode to generate periodic interrupts.

entry.para: Number of ticks between two interrupts.

note.title: Note
note.para: When the variable __Vendor_SysTickConfig is set to 1, then the function SysTick_Config is not included. In this case, the file device.h must contain a vendor-specific implementation of this function.
